author: wtopstaff
title: Canadiens-Senators Sums
text:
1 0—1 
First Period_1, Montreal, Plekanec 2 (Pacioretty, Gallagher), 9:41. 2, Montreal, Plekanec 3, 18:34. Penalties_Chiasson, Ott (holding stick), 10:09; Galchenyuk, Mon (high-sticking), 11:48; Weise, Mon (roughing), 17:55; Turris, Ott (roughing), 17:55. 
Second Period_3, Ottawa, Pageau 1, 9:09 (sh). Penalties_Stone, Ott (cross-checking), 4:33; Smith-Pelly, Mon (roughing), 8:39; Methot, Ott (roughing), 8:39; Stone, Ott (roughing), 8:39; Smith, Ott (hooking), 9:30; Semin, Mon (hooking), 10:59; Wiercioch, Ott (slashing), 13:16. 
Third Period_4, Montreal, Mitchell 1 (Subban, Markov), 5:41. Penalties_Wiercioch, Ott (holding), 10:16; Smith-Pelly, Mon (slashing), 13:07; Stone, Ott (high-sticking), 13:38; Mitchell, Mon (holding), 18:02. 
Shots on Goal_Montreal 15-9-10_34. Ottawa 6-6-9_21. 
Power-play opportunities_Montreal 0 of 7; Ottawa 0 of 4. 
Goalies_Montreal, Condon 1-0-0 (21 shots-20 saves). Ottawa, O’Connor 0-1-0 (34-31). 
A_19,177 (19,153). T_2:40. 
Referees_Tim Peel, TJ Luxmore. Linesmen_Don Henderson, David Brisebois. Topics:
